snippet: Priscilla Santos and her children lost their home, but the challenges didn’t stop there.
abstract: Editorial describes challenges faced by Priscilla Santos, single mother whose apartment was destroyed by Hurricane Sandy in 2012 and who has since struggled to get back on her feet; notes that Santos was helped by Brooklyn Community Services, which is supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, and invites donations to fund.
